  • Method Details

    • read

      public void read​(String filename) throws FileNotFoundException, game.InvalidInputException
      This method opens the input file and reads and stores the contained fields and players. If there are also dice rolls, it will store those too.
      Parameters:
      filename - name of the file the inputs are contained in
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - - file not found
      game.InvalidInputException - - invalid input
